product_name: Mountain Hardwear Microstretch Zip-T Fleece Pullover - Women's - 2013 Closeout
long_description: Work hard, but stay comfortable, as you climb or ski in the women's Microstretch Zip-T Fleece Pullover from Mountain Hardwear. 100% polyester body offers polyester/spandex side panels for enhanced mobility. High collar features a deep 12-in. zipper for excellent venting. Zippered arm pocket stashes small essentials. The Mountain Hardwear Microstretch Zip-T Fleece Pullover for women features flatlock seams for non-chafing comfort. Closeout.
short_description: Work hard, but stay comfortable, as you climb or ski in the women's Microstretch Zip-T Fleece Pullover from Mountain Hardwear.
